text: Well, you can always find out what he said, if it made news. Gotta grab those crowd quotes before they scatter.
author: toddgillman

text: A snag in @BetoORourke's pitch to end divisiveness: voters only want a unifier from their own side
author: toddgillman

text: Donald Trump says his 'dream' is to run against @BetoORourke
author: toddgillman

text: .@KamalaHarris heads to Texas -- @BetoORourke and @JuliánCastro's turf (by @gromerjeffers)
author: toddgillman

text: Dashboard cheat sheet for @BetoORourke visit to Laconia, NH. Where to. Who's introducing him. Time to catch his flight. #fitn
author: toddgillman

text: Man from New London asks @BetoORourke to disavow first use policy for US nuclear weapons. Beto in Laconia, NH. "I ageee that we should never use nuclear weapons first in a conflict." #fitn
author: toddgillman

text:
.@BetoORourke compares politics to punk rock. Punk freed rock from corporate control and voters can free American society and government.
  You had to be there. #fitn
author: toddgillman

text: Not that it's a contest but Wayfarer Coffee Roasters in Laconia, NH, is packed to capacity for @BetoORourke. Fellow Texan @JulianCastro popped in for a coffee Jan. 16 much more low key. #fitn
author: toddgillman

text: And, throwback Thursday: That time @SecretaryPerry got an earful from New Hampshire voters at @PopoversCafe in Portsmouth. #FITN
author: toddgillman

text: At eatery where New Hampshire Democrats ambushed @SecretaryPerry back in 2011, @BetoORourke gets warmer welcome #FITN
author: toddgillman

text: "I bring greetings from El Paso, where my parents told me never to eat Mexican food anywhere else. At Consuelo’s we’re going to make an exception to that rule," @BetoORourke says in Manchester, NH #fitn
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke on a milk crate
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke speaks to overflow crowd at Popovers on the Square in Portsmouth, NH. Many waited over an hour outside. #Fitn
author: toddgillman

text: A milk crate. A crowd. The only thing  missing is @BetoORourke #StuffBetoStandsOn
author: toddgillman

text: These folks won't get into Popovers. Staff is keeping the door locked. If they're really at capacityhow does @BetoORourke get to go in? New Hampshire. #Fitn
author: toddgillman

text: Overflow crowd for @BetoORourke at Popovers in Portsmouth NH. The staff won't let Beto advance staff inside, let alone press.  #Fitn
author: toddgillman

text:
Another unequivocal answer. Although @BetoORourke wants ti scrap the #ElectoralCollege to equ3lize the value of each vote nationwide, he won't apply the same logic to Senate seats -- two per state, big and small alike. 

"I'm ruling it out," he says in gaggle after UNH event.
author: toddgillman

text: At UNH, @BetoORourke sticking around for pictures and chats long after the event ended and cleared out. It's 12 hours after his first event started. #FITN
author: toddgillman

text: Unequivocal answer when @BetoORourke is asked at UNH whether he supports a #universalbasicincome as proposed by @AndrewYang: "I do not."
author: toddgillman

text: McCain set high bar for civility that @realDonaldTrump lacks, says @BetoORourke of president’s ongoing barbs
author: toddgillman

text: Scrap the Electoral College? Protect-late term abortion? @BetoORourke faces new litmus test issues
author: toddgillman

text: 2/2 "That kind of dignity and civility and mutual respect, in our politics is missing, obviously, right now, and the bar was really set by, by Sen. McCain so I just hope that we go back to his example," says @BetoORourke.
author: toddgillman

text:
1/2 @BetoORourke on the Trump/McCain feud, recalls the town hall in 2008 when McCain cut off a question asserting that @BarackObama was a danger to the country.

"He confronted that person and set the record straight...
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke thanks the brewery for making beer and making people happy.
author: toddgillman

text: The smell of beer at the Tuckerman Brewing Co in Conway, NH, is very distracting as we await @BetoORourke. The crowd is getting loose, though. #FITN #5oclocksomewhere @TuckermanBrews #NHbeers
author: toddgillman

text: Update: I did not see a moose.
author: toddgillman

text: Looking forward to seeing a moose. #FITN
author: toddgillman

text:
Plymouth State University freshman Kaci Pomeroy asks @BetoORourke how she can trust him on #climatechange when he has so much support from oil industry.

"I'm opposed to climate change," he says, adding, "I am not friends with and oil or gas companies." #Fitn
author: toddgillman

text:
.@BetoORourke's $6.1 million first day haul came from 128,000 donors, averaging $47 each. 

For comparison, @BernieSanders' $5.9 million first day haul came from 223,000 donors, average $27.
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke says he got donations from 128,000 people his first 24 hours. Average $47. That's from his $6.1 million first day haul.
author: toddgillman

text:
Another NH man wants to know how @BetoORourke would beat Trump, who last week said he waves his arms around too much and looks crazy. 

"You do wave your arms around a lot, but you're not crazy," the man says. m
author: toddgillman

text:
Man in Claremont, NH. “Republican senators are basically cowards… We have a criminal in the White House.”
 
@BetoORourke: “I want to acknowledge the danger that the president poses to this country and our democracy"
author: toddgillman

text: In Claremont, NH, @BetoORourke is talking about keeping to the high road. Notes that he ran against @TedCruz. "Maybe you’ve heard of him. Not the nicest guy in some of things that he would say about us, or about my family."
author: toddgillman

text: 2/2 @BetoORourke says if he's the nominee "I think we can win #Texas....We've proven that we know how to campaign. We've been each one of those 254 counties. We've listened to the stories our fellow Texans have told us. We've incorporated it in the way that we campaign."
author: toddgillman

text: 1/2 In the #TXSen race, @BetoORourke held @TedCruz below 51%. Lost by 2.6% but that was the closest any Democrat had come in a statewide race since 1994, and he collected more votes than any Democrat ever on the ballot in Texas.
author: toddgillman

text: Could you win Texas? "Yes," says @BetoORourke says.
author: toddgillman

text: Dark @BetoORourke: "If you are worried about 400,000 apprehensions on our southern border w/Mexico last year, wait until some of the countries in the Western hemisphere are no longer habitable....The refugee crisis here and all over the world is beyond our imagination." #climate
author: toddgillman

text: "I don't think he's instilling fear at all. He and a lot of other people are trying to scream the realities and get people to wake up," said one New Hampshire voter. @BetoORourke #FITN #climatechange
author: toddgillman

text: At first N.H. stop, @BetoORourke warns that #climatechange could trigger a massive refugee crisis
author: toddgillman

text: Warm welcome for @BetoORourke in Keene, NH. The crowd was bigger 75 minutes earlier. #FITN
author: toddgillman

text: Before and after. On the left, the crowd when @BetoORourke was scheduled to arrive. On the left, an hour later. Still waiting for his first event in New Hampshire. #FITN
author: toddgillman

text: An gour after @BetoORourke was supposed to be at his first New Hampshire event, the crowd has definitely thinned at Keene State College despite pleas for patience.#FITN
author: toddgillman

text: "We'll be there soon," @BetoORourke says via Facebook Live, a full hour after his scheduled start in Keene, NH. Crowd has thinned. Started in State College, Pa. "This is the longest drive of the campaign so far. Eight hours on the road. So there's still some kinks to work out."
author: toddgillman

text: ^event. Not evenr. #thumbtyping
author: toddgillman

text: Many hundreds await @BetoORourke at Keene State College, his first evenr on 3-day tour of New Hampshire. #fitn
author: toddgillman

text: Trump rejects #courtpacking, idea backed by @BetoORourke, @KamalaHarris, @EWarren and other 2020 Democrats
author: toddgillman

text:
Just in from the White House, @realDonaldTrump has named a new ambassador to #Mexico: conservative appellate lawyer Christopher Landau. 

This critical post has been vacant since last May, when @Jacobson_RS resigned.
author: toddgillman

text: White House diktat could revoke hundreds of reporters' press passes
author: toddgillman

text: A bold prediction in NH: @JulianCastro says he believes he'll win primary #FITN
author: toddgillman

text: "Record" is the word in quotation marks, not claims.
author: toddgillman

text: .@KamalaHarris wastes little time fundraising off @BetoORourke record 24-hour haul.
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke claims 'record' $6.1 million haul in first 24 hours, edging out @BernieSanders
author: toddgillman

text: I do believe that @amyklobuchar is throwing some shade at @BetoORourke #borntorun
author: toddgillman

text:
Stumping in Wis, @BetoORourke responds to GOP Irish drunk attack:
"We cannot meet this challenge with more partisanship, more pettiness, more meanness, more personal and partisan attacks."

One notable reaction from conservative Rep. @justinamash: "Do better, @GOP. Be better."
author: toddgillman

text: GOP pastes leprechaun hat on @BetoORourke's DWI mug shot in  #StPatricksDay 'drink responsibly' message
author: toddgillman

text: @DanMulhall Wondering what the Irish ambassador thinks about this.
author: toddgillman

text:
For the uninitiated, that's @BetoORourke's mug shot from a DWI arrest the night he turned 26. 
Interesting the @GOP goes with "Paddy" as nickname for St. Patrick, but avoids using "Beto," which O'Rourke's parents began using when he was born and which he's used most of his life.
author: toddgillman

text: A kid named Sam asks @BetoORourke in Madison, Wis.: "Can you please be nice?" Beto pivots to Trump, hits him for depicting Mexican immigrants as murderers and rapists, praising neo-Nazis as very fine people, says spike in hate crimes doesn't happen w/out Trump signaling it's OK.
author: toddgillman

text:
“We’re all tired of only white guys running everything,” says one Iowa woman.

@BetoORourke addresses white, male privilege at outset of #2020 campaign: "I have enjoyed white privilege — absolutely. Undeniable.”
author: toddgillman

text: If Twitter had the opposite of a "like" button, I would click that. The loss of news outlets and newsroom jobs doesn't mean there's less news. It just means that less news gets covered, and uncovered.
author: toddgillman

text: Ha
author: toddgillman

text:
.@BetoORourke would likely pick a woman for vice president: 'That would be my preference' 
#veepstakes
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke says he wants a woman as his vice president. "That would be my preference," he says, quickly adding that it would be presumptuous to make such a commitment. A man at Dubuque loudly pressed him to promise to pick a woman VP
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke says he supports the Equal Rights Amendment to put wage and other protections for women into the Constitution. #ERA
author: toddgillman

text: Dubuque house party is crammed. Overflow in basement is watching on a feed. Basement! Are you out there? The roar ripples up to the kitchen, where @BetoORourke is in the corner. #IACaucus
author: toddgillman

text: Same selfie face with every presidential candidate. #IACaucus @BetoORourke
author: toddgillman

text:
Still no campaign manager. Who's running it? "There are a number of people working together on this campaign, " @BetoORourke says in Dubuque.

Hasn't released fundraising tally since declaring. How you paying for all this?  "We've raised money that allows us to do this. "
author: toddgillman

text: Jam packed house party in Dubuque. @BetoORourke's final stop of 3-day Iowa swing. #IACaucus
author: toddgillman

text: Iowan tells @BetoORourke in Independence IA that "I don't want @JoeBiden to run." Too old. Says Beto, we could use his perspective and there's room for "14, 15, 73 candidates."
author: toddgillman

text: White, male and privileged? Yes I am, @BetoORourke says, and it shouldn't be taken for granted
author: toddgillman

text:
.@BetoORourke heads from Iowa to Wis, Ohio and Pa. 
But, insight into his strategy on his website job page: 
"Do you have work experience or live in any of the following states?"

The first four (Iowa, NH, NV, SC) plus Ala, Calif, Mass, Minn, Okla, Tenn, Texas, VT, Virginia
author: toddgillman

text: New @BetoORourke on hacker revelations: “Really hateful. Really bad stuff. I’m mortified to read it now but I have to take ownership.…Whatever my intention was as a teenager, it doesn’t matter…I have to look long and hard at my actions, and...constantly try to do better."
author: toddgillman

text: .@PPLiveIowa asks @BetoORourke about his viral comments defending NFL player protests during the #nationalanthem. "It's the way I feel. ... I was not expecting a question in the way it was framed"in terms of it being disrespectful to veterans.
author: toddgillman

text: .@PPLiveIowa asks @BetoORourke about @BarackObama. He recalls flying w/Obama to Vietnam on Air Force One. Calls him "the greatest president of my lifetime."
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke brought presents for the podcast hosts. Albums. Santana III and "a Texas treasure, Asleep at the Wheel" @aatw1969
author: toddgillman

text:
Weirdest thing that's happened to you in politics?
“People wearing T-shirts with your name is – amazing,” @BetoORourke says.
author: toddgillman

text: At @RAYGUNshirts in Cedar Rapids, @BetoORourke gets a fresh "Iowa for Beto" shirt ahead of taping a podcast.
author: toddgillman

text:
.@BetoORourke on #impeachment:

"I'm not asking Congress to do one thing or the other. I'm just saying -- you're asking me, has the president committed impeachable offenses? Yes. Period."
author: toddgillman

text: .@BetoORourke evolves on impeachment: still thinks it's justified but no longer says he'd vote for it #Impeachment #IACaucus https://www.dallasnews.com/news/politics/2019/03/15/beto-orourke-evolves-impeachment-still-thinks-justified-no-longer-says-vote …
author: toddgillman

text: Not this trip.
author: toddgillman

text:
More @BetoORourke: 
"All I can do is my best, which is what I'm trying to do. I can't control anything I've done in the past. I can only control what I do going forward and what I plan to do is give this my best."
author: toddgillman

text: On the hacker revelations, @BetoORourke says "You know, stuff I was part of as, as a teenager. It's not anything I'm proud of today, and I mean, that's-- that's the long and short of it."
author: toddgillman

text: FEC fines @tedcruz $35k for 2012 campaign finance violation
author: toddgillman

text:
Iowan asks about @BetoORourke's vote against funding for Israel's #IronDome system, used this week as rockets flew from Gaza. Echoes of #TXSen and @TedCruz attacks.

“Took a lot of hell over that vote," Beto says but this $ was rushed w/out enough info.
author: toddgillman

text: Asked about his desire to remove some #BorderWall and what he would do with people in US illegally, @BetoORourke says 1m #Dreamers should be made citizens. He sidesteps the part about why some fencing should come down. In Washington, Iowa. #IACaucus
author: toddgillman

text: A crush of media. @BetoORourke. Delicate objects of art. What could go wrong. #iacaucus in Washington, Iowa
author: toddgillman
